original_text: Achish replied, ‘I believe that you are as good as an angel from God. But the Philistine leaders have said, “David must not go with us to fight the battle.” Achish replied, ‘I believe that you are as good as an angel from God. But the Philistine leaders have said, “David must not go with us to fight the battle.”
korean_text: 아기스가 다윗에게 대답하여 이르되 네가 내 목전에 하나님의 전령 같이 선한 것을 내가 아나 블레셋 사람들의 방백들은 말하기를 그가 우리와 함께 전장에 올라가지 못하리라 하니

sentences.original_text: I believe that you are as good as an angel from God
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 당신이 하나님의 천사만큼 훌륭하다고 믿는다

sentences.original_text: But the Philistine leaders have said
David must not go with us to fight the battle
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗은 우리와 함께 전투하러 가면 안 된다

sentences.korean_translation: 내가 당신이 하나님의 천사만큼 훌륭하다고 믿는다
